snippet: The battle for Bihar played out against a national debate over whether the prime minister’s India is becoming increasingly intolerant of secularists, Muslims and political dissent in general.
abstract: Voters in Bihar reject Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi's Bharatiya Janata Party in state assembly elections, significant political setback for Modi, who had framed elections there as referendum on his track record as prime minister.
lead_paragraph: The battle for Bihar played out against a national debate over whether the prime minister’s India is becoming increasingly intolerant of secularists, Muslims and political dissent in general.

headline.main: Modi Dealt Setback as B.J.P. Loses in Bihar, a Crucial State
headline.print_headline: Indian Leader Dealt Setback in Crucial Vote
